DOC.brief_summary: A dose ranging study to evaluate safety and efficacy of bromfenac ophthalmic solution in dry eye disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Ranging Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution in Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Be of either gender and any race 18 years or older Have a local or systemic disease that could interfere with the assessment of safety or efficacy or that is likely to result in early discontinuation from the study
DOC.keyword: Sign and symptoms of dry eye disease
